title: Welcome, Kick-off Meeting
Overview: In Week 1, work with your partner and team to understand the problem, stakeholder and partner requirements, and the project scope.

PM.0: Populate backlog with tasks for the next two weeks
PM.2: Set up User Research to be conducted next week

Deliverables.0: Discovery Phase worksheet (Send to your mentors and Erica)

title: Research and Code Experiment
Overview: Interview users to understand their problem, and create personas. Conduct code experiment 0.

Everyone.0: Personas: based on the user research. Aim to create these together in your team meeting!

PM.0: User Research: help conduct (if needed) and follow-up correspondence
PM.2: Meet with the team to define Feature Spec and define project scope

title: Define and Code Experiment
Overview: Define the core features and sketch those features as a team. Present sketched options to your partner for feedback and a design direction. Conduct code experiment 1.

PM.0: Define milestones for next three weeks
PM.1: Gather all content/data from the partner
PM.2: Set up Rapid User Testing for next week

Dev.0: Code Experiment 1 OR start on code scaffolding

title: Grayscales™, Code Scaffolding
Overview: Create Grayscales™ for each main interaction and screen. Conduct rapid user testing to validate design solutions. Setup initial code scaffolding with tools and frameworks chosen.

PM.1: Write a brief team update for DALI PR

title: Style Guide, Rudimentary Functionality
Overview: Settle on a style guide and apply to all screens, including insights gained from user testing. Connect all necessary code components together. Rudimentary functionality in place and components are connected and exchange data.

PM.1: Check in with team about their individual goals

Deliverables.0: Initial Hi-Fi mockups and Style Guide

title: Refine and Functionality
Overview: Refine designs and have basic functionality in place.

PM.0: Triage bugs that arose from testing
PM.1: Address any scope questions and/or changes
PM.2: Meet with the team to define Feature Spec and define project scope

Deliverables.0: Completed Hi-Fi mockups in a click through prototype

title: Add Delight, Bughunt
Overview: Solidify designs and add in delightful features and interactions. Focus on function over form to get MVP functionality complete. Participate in a bughunt. Help other teams find bugs in the demos!

PM.1: Get App on Testflight/website hosted on Github pages

Des.1: Close out open comments and feedback

title: Design Docs and Bug Fixes
Overview: Create design documentation such as style guides and demo videos. Iterate fixing bugs from bug-hunt.

title: DEMOS and User Feedback
Overview: MVP demos and testing of the projects for this term. The main focus will be on getting user feedback. Science fair style. Open to public.

PM.2: Send Handoff documents to partner (after approval from staff)
PM.3: Celebrate and post-mortem with the team
